column2: Create a new level for Maze
1) Copy this spreadsheet (from the File menu, choose "Make a copy")
2) Edit the cells in the grid to what you want
3) Make sure your grid is in the upper left and spans a 8 x 8 grid, as it does in this file.
4) Export the file as a csv and upload it to: http://learn.code.org/maze_builder
